com.spotify.flo.context

Interface MemoizingContext.Memoizer<T>

  • Enclosing class:
    MemoizingContext

    public static interface MemoizingContext.Memoizer<T>

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  MemoizingContext.Memoizer.Impl
      Marks a method with signature public static Memoizer<T> memoizer().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<T> lookup(Task<T> task)
      Lookup a memoized value for a given task.
      static <T> MemoizingContext.Memoizer<T> noop()
      A memoizer that does nothing and always returns empty lookup(com.spotify.flo.Task<T>) values
      void store(Task<T> task, T value)
      Store an evaluated value for a given task.

    • Method Detail

      • lookup

        Optional<T> lookup(Task<T> task)
        Lookup a memoized value for a given task. Implementation can throw out a RuntimeException and that would fail the task evaluation.
        Parameters:
        task - The task for which the lookup is made
        Returns:
        An optional memoized value for the task

      • store

        void store(Task<T> task,
           T value)
        Store an evaluated value for a given task. Implementation can throw out a RuntimeException and that would fail the task evaluation.
        Parameters:
        task - The task for which the value was produced
        value - The value that was produced

      • noop

        static <T> MemoizingContext.Memoizer<T> noop()
        A memoizer that does nothing and always returns empty lookup(com.spotify.flo.Task<T>) values
